answers.answer: I think you should go to the ER just to be safe.  I am sure all is fine, but it is better to be safe.  Please keep us posted on what is going on.  Good luck. Kasie

I agree w/ fungirl!  Darkestlight-you give a lot of comfort to others w/ similar posts and I would figure that you would also recommend for peace of mind to go to ER.  It's your baby and life and you have every right to have that peace of mind...All the best and yes, let us know how you are!!!   Sylvia
I would def. go! I'm sure everything is fine, but you'll worry yourself sick wondering if you don't know for sure. Please let us know that everything is ok! Hugs and prayers!
I would go to for ur pice of mind...everything is prob ok..but if u dont go u will be worryed all night and thats not good for u or the baby....val

Yes please go to the ER. It is better to be safe than sorry. I have been in and out of ER's and my doctors office since I found out I am pregnant. I am just under 20 weeks. It seems like whenever something happens that is not "normal" I call my doctor. I miscarried in October 2006 so I am very nervous. Even though I am 20 weeks along I still can't seem to feel better about everything. Let us know how things turn out ok? I will be praying for you!-Danielle
Wanted to know how this turned out.  Let us know!

I went to bed too early!Hope everything went ok.  Its never a bad idea to be sure about something, but usually if its amniotic fluid, it doesn't happen only after urinating.  But that's not a foolproof way to tell, and often the only answer is to go get it checked out.Let us know!
Gosh I hope you're ok!!! Let us know!
oh boy...how are you today? did you get checked?i know you don't need any extra stress.sending *hugs* and support your way
You poor thing....One thing after another.  Let us know how you are doing!!!Chelly-how are you feeling????
are you ok honney? did you got checked? please let us know, i am sorry i missed your post yesterday, i slept early, yeah 2:00 am it is not early.

Oh my!   Doesn't sound like your having much fun at all!   Please tell me you have stopped working!   Are they planning on taking the girls right at 36 or 37 weeks??    I'm sure this crazy heat isn't helping with your swelling..  You poor thing, I can picture the alligator feet!  lolI'm hoping to have him by the beggining of next week!   I just want to make it until my mom get here on Sunday.  Ya, like I have a choice.  lol

fat!!!i have resolved myself to 10 more weeks of agony. lol . last week i got a 210 on the one hour gestational diabetes test. this week i go for the 3 hour. it feels pretty pointless to me honestly. my babies gained a pound and a half each in a month. i am pretty sure i have gd. lol. but i'll play along and drink the **** again.... geez. you think they could come up with a shot or a pill. that liquid is icky( my doctor uses on that is like flat tab soda with a cup of sugar mixed in!)the preeclampsia is holding steady. my bp is so so and my feet no longer resemble any thing that belongs at the end of a leg. i swear they now look like alligator feet!!!! just picture that in your head. lolare you gonna have that baby already or what?!!!!to darkest- i really hope you are okay. i'm worried you haven't popped back on yet. :(

Thanks for everyones concern! Well I didn't go. I waited a bit and compared smells again. Figured it smelled like pee. I also followed some online instructions I found to see if it was pooling which it wasn't. So I should be fine. My DD seems fine and not under stress and shes still kicking like crazy. So I figure I'm going to the doctor tomorrow and I'll have him check my fluid lvls to be sure that things are ok.
Good luck and god Bless............. I pray that you all have healthy pregnancies, babies and labories...Baby Dust to us.................................

question: Alright well I'm 29wks pregnant, and almost every time i pee  i leak a little bit afterwards...so i put a panty liner on or something.... well i got up a little bit ago and checked my undies and they were soaked and it doesn't look like or smell like pee to me, but maybe its urine and just doesn't have a strong smell. I didn't even realize I was wet.... I don't want to go to the ER if it's nothing. i went to the ER at 21wks for leaking a bit of fluid then and i was fine. But this isn't a little like last time. Can I wait till the morning and be ok?
title: I hope someones still awake..... Go the L&D tonight or can i wait till tomorrow?
